citation: Water Management (Watercourse Authority Exemption) Amendment Order 2016 (Tas)
text:
Water Management (Watercourse Authority Exemption) Amendment Order 2016

I make the following order under section 123G(1) of the Water Management Act 1999 .

23 August 2016

JEREMY ROCKLIFF

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Water Management (Watercourse Authority Exemption) Amendment Order 2016 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Water Management (Watercourse Authority Exemption) Order 2009 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Water Management (Watercourse Authority Exemption) Order 2009 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 7 September 2016

This order is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
